name: Al'tushka dlja Skufa
storyline:
You don’t have a wife, you’re well over forty, and your worldview is firmly formed, but you still don’t have happiness in life? Don’t be sad, you just need to remember the password for your account on Skufservices and in just a couple of clicks you will learn how to receive your legal alt-girl from the state!
An immersive first-person skuf simulator in visual novel format, assembled on knees in a month - the best you can get in the genre for the money. Okay, you can find better ones. You are right. By the way, what is “Immersive”?
summary: Say that any skuf can legally receive girl from the state; to do this, you just need to log in to a special service and enter your personal data.
